body.name: Pumpkin Doodle The Original Write and Reuse Baby Bottle Labels for Daycare
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 26 mins
features: Each set of daycare bottle labels includes 6 high quality bottle band and one free dry erase marker
Super strechy to fit around all baby bottles and adds a grippy texture which is great for babies learning to hold their own bottle.
Made from high quality food grade silicone. These will last for years and do not deteriorate with use.
BPA free. Waterproof, dishwasher, microwave and freezer safe.
Easy to use. Write on the label, let it dry and wash with soap and water and reuse!

productInformation.name: Material free
productInformation.value: ‎Phthalates Free, BPA Free, Latex Free, Lead Free

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎You can clean your labels by using soap and water scrubbing gently. These labels are safe in the dishwasher, however dishwashers will not remove the writing. Gently scrubbing the writing off using your finger or a sponge is recommended before placing in the dishwasher. If marker residue is present after many uses, using acetone nail polish remover and gently scrubbing the labels should remove any haze.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YOUR PARENTING LABELING NEEDS: EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO KNOW Hey Busy Parents! Whether you are a first-time parent or a seasoned veteran (please send us your secrets), looking to make your life a little easier and more organized, Pumpkin Doodle Labeling Products have you covered!

THE BENEFITS 4 REASONS YOU'LL LOVE OUR LABELS Getting your children out the door in a timely manner is always a struggle for parents. Our labels can help you prepare your week and help you stay organized. Our top four benefits include: 1. ORGANIZATION We have labels for baby bottles, baby food and even your older children. Make life easier by labeling their baby bottles, baby food and sports/water bottles. 2. LONGER-LASTING RESULTS The silicone we use is BPA Free, stretch resistant and long-lasting! 3. MULTIPLE COLORS We have asked around, and we are constantly receiving feedback on our products and colors! We currently offer the most-trendy colors in labeling! 4. DAYCARES & SCHOOLS LOVE OUR LABELS Many people find all baby bottles, food containers, sippy cups and water bottles HAVE to be labeled at daycare and school. Our labels will ensure your child and their teacher know which containers are theirs.

Requirement for Daycare Most states require all baby bottles to be labeled when sending your child to daycare, child care, school program, etc. Our Doodle Bands are the perfect solution for labeling your baby's bottles.

Why we created Doodle Bands One night we were so frustrated with the sticky labels our daycare required we use and remove every day, we asked ourselves, 'What can we do to make this easier?' We played around with a few ideas and finally agreed a writable, reusable band using a dry erase marker was the perfect solution. We are a family run business and always will be. We hope you enjoy our products and we hope to make your life a little easier too!

How to use them Soap, water and a sponge will ensure your label is clean. White vinegar can also help remove excess residue. Write with any dry erase marker. Let the labels dry before using. Write and change your info daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, Work as Described
reviews.reviewText: WE bought these to fit a range of bottles types that we put milk in for daycare given everything has to be labeled. They wash well and are way to use. (We have used for 3 straight months now and they look new). I would recommend buying different dry erase markers as the one included works but dried out quickly for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for daycare
reviews.reviewText: As soon as these labels arrived, I tested one to see if it held up to my expectation. The package came with an EXPO ultra fine tip dry erase marker.The writing is very clear on the label. I rubbed the label with cloth and my hand to see if the writing was removed and it was not. I wet the label and rubbed the writing with my hand. The writing smeared a little but was still legible. When I attempted to wash the writing away, it did come off but left a light "ghost" of the writing behind. It wasnt bad though, you could write over it easily and it did not effect the new info. If it is bothersome, i used a little bit of hand sanitizer to clean the label and it was as good as new.I got the SMALL blue labels. They fit my 4oz glass evenflo bottle. The evenflos are similar in size to dr. Brown. I have not used on my 4oz dr. Brown but i am confident that it will.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and fit various bottles
reviews.reviewText: Pros:These labels are stretchable, have a cute design, and fits all the different bottles we have used. They are easy to write on, and the ink from the marker that accompanied it is fairly durable. The ink washes off quite easily with a paper towel and water. The ink has held up so far in the bottle warmers at daycare.Con:The marker began to dry after a few weeks of use. I expected it to last longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to label baby bottles
reviews.reviewText: Great product and easy to use for Daycare! Only complaint is the markers run out after a few months and I had to order more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for baby bottles at daycare
reviews.reviewText: Really well made product. The pen that comes with it was dried out and not useful at all. Just chuck the pen regardless and use permanent or dry erase marker. The silicone labels were really well made. Initially, it will need some muscle to place the sleeve on the bottles, but it gets easier with use. Loved the orange color, it's muted and not too bright. Also, we were the only family that used this color so easy to keep baby's bottles separated. This fit most bottles from the ones that were wider to the slim ones. It kept the permanent marker writing on it for several months. Easy to wash in the dishwasher or hand wash. Now that we don't need it for milk bottles, I think it is perfect for sippy cups and snack cups during play dates, park visits, or anytime you have other kiddos in the mix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Writing wipes off easily
reviews.reviewText: The small size did fit the 4 ounce dr brown bottles well. The marker that came with the product was dried out and didn’t work. I wanted to use these to help visually organize milk by date for daycare but the dry erase marker wipes off so easily that it didn’t work for me. Just the bottles rubbing against each other in a bag caused the writing to wipe away. The idea of the product is great, just didn’t work for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are so easy to use! Washed off easily, but not to easily. Great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These bands are great. We got them for our bottles for daycare. They fit my avent bottles perfect! They write on nice and smooth with the expo included and wipe off easily with soap and water when I wash the bottles.

reviews.reviewTitle: Useful if you pump at work and send bottles to daycare.
reviews.reviewText: These are so handy for labelling daycare bottles. I bought 2 packs, and have the same colours in each pack. I pair up 2 colours for each day’s pumped bottles. Daycare easily knows what bottle to offer first (especially if she isn’t drinking much at daycare) and I can grab the right bottle at a glance. These fit well over medela bottles, and I have also put them on ikea cups that were filled with smoothie and covered with a silicone straw lid.
EVk! Lol they put the they fine print that these do not fit the dr browns bottles lol if only people read and look before they post 😆
